name: Ludo Ultimate
description:
Ludo Ultimate is an Indian mobile game application developed by Er. Shashank Baranwal. It has been developed on Unity game engine and is available on Android, iOS, Kindle and Windows Phone platforms. The game is a modernization of the board game, Ludo, which in turn is based on the ancient Indian game of Pachisi.

Ludo is a type of board game that can be played by 2 or 4 players. In this game, players have to run their 4 tokens from start to finishing point according to the roll of the dice. Ludo is similar to many other games including cross and circle, especially Pachisi's Indian game. However, it is much simpler than Pachisi. The game of Ludo and its variants has gained widespread popularity in many countries around the world under various names.
